Preferred alias for st_guided_filter3d

guided_filter3d.Rd

Preferred alias for st_guided_filter3d

Usage

guided_filter3d(vol, radius = 4L, eps = 0.7^2, guide = NULL, mask = NULL)

Arguments

vol

3D array or neuroim2::NeuroVol

radius

integer window radius (voxels)

eps

regularization (variance floor) in signal units^2

guide

3D array or NeuroVol; if NULL uses vol

mask

3D logical/0-1 mask; NULL => all voxels

See also

st_guided_filter3d
